products.name: Black Tee / Classic Fit
products.description: The original Black T-Shirt. Everyday fit with a clean neckline and soft-touch cotton.
products.descriptionAr: التيشيرت الأسود الأصلي. قصة يومية ورقبة نظيفة وقماش ناعم.

products.name: Black Tee / Oversized
products.description: A relaxed, street-ready cut with dropped shoulders. Perfect for a bolder look.
products.descriptionAr: قصة مريحة مع أكتاف منخفضة. مثالي للمظهر الجريء.

products.name: Black Tee / Slim
products.description: A sharper, slimmer silhouette that sits close to the body for a more tailored look.
products.descriptionAr: قصة أنحف تلتصق بالجسم لمظهر أكثر أناقة.

home.heroSubtitle: Black T-Shirt is a modern Moroccan streetwear brand built around one iconic piece: the perfect black tee. Minimal, premium and designed to live on the streets of Morocco.
home.feature1Text: Inspired by the energy of Moroccan youth, our tees are made to move with you — from Ouarzazate to Casablanca.
home.feature2Text: Clean lines, no noise. Just a sharp black tee that upgrades any outfit, any day.
home.feature3Text: Order from anywhere in Morocco. We ship straight to your door, fast and reliably.
home.stripText: One color. One cut. Endless outfits. Wear it with jeans, cargos, or layered under a jacket — Black T-Shirt just works.

testimonial1.text: "The fit is perfect and the black doesn't fade after washing. It became my go-to T-shirt."
testimonial1.name: Yassine

testimonial2.text: "Simple, clean and feels premium. I wear it to class and at night with friends."
testimonial2.name: Imane

testimonial3.text: "Delivery to Rabat was fast and the packaging was on point. I ordered a second one immediately."
testimonial3.name: Omar

about.title: Built in Ouarzazate. Worn everywhere.
about.subtitle: Black T-Shirt is a Moroccan streetwear brand focused on one essential piece: the perfect black tee.
about.storyP1: Black T-Shirt was born in Ouarzazate, Morocco — a city known for its film sets, light and energy. We wanted to create something just as iconic: a simple, powerful black T-shirt that fits perfectly into modern Moroccan life.
about.storyP2: Instead of chasing every trend, we focus on one product and make it right. Clean lines, premium fabric and a fit that works on the streets, in class, at work or on a night out.

values.title: Minimalism
values.text: One essential piece that works with everything you own.

values.title: Quality
values.text: Comfortable fabric, sharp color and a fit tested on real people.

values.title: Accessibility
values.text: Premium feel without the heavy price tag. Every tee is 200 MAD.

values.title: Moroccan street culture
values.text: Designed with the rhythm of our streets, campuses and cafés in mind.

about.businessType: Clothing brand focused on premium black T-shirts.
about.priceInfo: Flat price of 200 MAD per item.

contact.title: Let's make your next favorite tee.
contact.subtitle: Reach out to order, ask about sizing, or talk collaborations.
contact.talkText: For the fastest response, send us a WhatsApp message with your name, city and how many T-shirts you want.
contact.whatsappMessage: Hi Black T-Shirt, I want to order a T-shirt.

floatingContact.defaultMessage: Hi Black T-Shirt, I'd like to order a T-shirt.
